Title: A Cock and Balls Story
Plot: The lockdown ends. After Hamid Khan's body is taken off life support, the Muslim's choose Arif to lead them. Meanwhile, Cyril's having nightmares about delivering the fatal blow to Khan in the boxing match. Ryan asks Sister Pete to intervene. Murphy makes a suggestion to help ease some of the strain in solitary after another inmate commits suicide. Father Mukada plants an inventive idea in Beecher's head on how to deal with Schillinger. Shirley Bellinger returns awaiting her date with the noose.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Lothaire Bluteau, Domenick Lombardozzi, Pepa, Dana Reeve, George Aguilar, Tessell Williams, Erik King, Male Baby Alexander, Michael Quill, Pepa, John Palumbo II
